system:
note description: "Objects that allow access to the operating %Nsystem clipboard." legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." date: "$Date: 2017-03-27 13:31:29 -0700 (Mon, 27 Mar 2017) $" revision: "$Revision: 100058 $"
class ../implementation_gtk/ev_clipboard_imp.xmlEV_CLIPBOARD_IMP
inherit ../implementation_interface/ev_clipboard_i.xmlEV_CLIPBOARD_I redefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_clipboard_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface end
../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I redefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_clipboard_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface end
create ../implementation_gtk/ev_clipboard_imp.xml#f_makemake
feature {NONE} -- Initialization
f_old_make../implementation_gtk/ev_clipboard_imp.xml#f_old_makeold_make (an_interface: attached like ../implementation_gtk/ev_clipboard_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface) -- Create Current with interface an_interface. do ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_assign_interfaceassign_interface (an_interface) end
f_make../implementation_gtk/ev_clipboard_imp.xml#f_makemake -- initialize Current. local cs: ../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_c_string.xmlEV_GTK_C_STRING do cs := create {attached ../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_c_string.xmlEV_GTK_C_STRING}.../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_c_string.xml#f_set_with_eiffel_stringset_with_eiffel_string (once "CLIPBOARD") ../implementation_gtk/ev_clipboard_imp.xml#f_clipboardclipboard := {../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xmlGTK2}.../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xml#f_gtk_clipboard_getgtk_clipboard_get ({../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gdk_atom_interngdk_atom_intern (cs.../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_c_string.xml#f_itemitem, 1)) cs := create {attached ../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_c_string.xmlEV_GTK_C_STRING}.../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_c_string.xml#f_set_with_eiffel_stringset_with_eiffel_string (once "PRIMARY") ../implementation_gtk/ev_clipboard_imp.xml#f_primaryprimary := {../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xmlGTK2}.../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xml#f_gtk_clipboard_getgtk_clipboard_get ({../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gdk_atom_interngdk_atom_intern (cs.../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_c_string.xml#f_itemitem, 1)) ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_set_is_initializedset_is_initialized (True) end
feature -- Access
f_has_text../implementation_gtk/ev_clipboard_imp.xml#f_has_texthas_text: FalseBOOLEAN -- Does the clipboard currently contain text? do {../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_callback_marshal.xmlEV_GTK_CALLBACK_MARSHAL}.../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_callback_marshal.xml#f_c_ev_gtk_callback_marshal_set_is_enabledc_ev_gtk_callback_marshal_set_is_enabled (False) Result := {../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xmlGTK2}.../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xml#f_gtk_clipboard_wait_is_text_availablegtk_clipboard_wait_is_text_available (../implementation_gtk/ev_clipboard_imp.xml#f_clipboardclipboard) {../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_callback_marshal.xmlEV_GTK_CALLBACK_MARSHAL}.../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_callback_marshal.xml#f_c_ev_gtk_callback_marshal_set_is_enabledc_ev_gtk_callback_marshal_set_is_enabled (True) end
f_text../implementation_gtk/ev_clipboard_imp.xml#f_texttext: FalseSTRING_32 -- Result is current clipboard content. local utf8_string: ../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_c_string.xmlEV_GTK_C_STRING text_ptr: FalsePOINTER do {../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_callback_marshal.xmlEV_GTK_CALLBACK_MARSHAL}.../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_callback_marshal.xml#f_c_ev_gtk_callback_marshal_set_is_enabledc_ev_gtk_callback_marshal_set_is_enabled (False) text_ptr := {../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xmlGTK2}.../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xml#f_gtk_clipboard_wait_for_textgtk_clipboard_wait_for_text (../implementation_gtk/ev_clipboard_imp.xml#f_clipboardclipboard) {../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_callback_marshal.xmlEV_GTK_CALLBACK_MARSHAL}.../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_callback_marshal.xml#f_c_ev_gtk_callback_marshal_set_is_enabledc_ev_gtk_callback_marshal_set_is_enabled (True) if text_ptr /= Falsedefault_pointer then create utf8_string.../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_c_string.xml#f_make_from_pointermake_from_pointer (text_ptr) Result := utf8_string.../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_c_string.xml#f_stringstring utf8_string.../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_c_string.xml#f_set_with_eiffel_stringset_with_eiffel_string (once "") else create Result.Falsemake_empty end end
feature -- Status Setting
f_set_text../implementation_gtk/ev_clipboard_imp.xml#f_set_textset_text (a_text: FalseREADABLE_STRING_GENERAL) -- Assign a_text to clipboard. local a_cs: ../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_c_string.xmlEV_GTK_C_STRING do a_cs := create {attached ../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_c_string.xmlEV_GTK_C_STRING}.../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_c_string.xml#f_set_with_eiffel_stringset_with_eiffel_string (a_text) {../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xmlGTK2}.../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xml#f_gtk_clipboard_set_textgtk_clipboard_set_text (../implementation_gtk/ev_clipboard_imp.xml#f_clipboardclipboard, a_cs.../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_c_string.xml#f_itemitem, a_cs.../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_c_string.xml#f_string_lengthstring_length) {../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xmlGTK2}.../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xml#f_gtk_clipboard_set_textgtk_clipboard_set_text (../implementation_gtk/ev_clipboard_imp.xml#f_primaryprimary, a_cs.../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_c_string.xml#f_itemitem, a_cs.../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_c_string.xml#f_string_lengthstring_length) a_cs.../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_c_string.xml#f_set_with_eiffel_stringset_with_eiffel_string (once "") end
feature {../implementation_gtk/ev_text_component_imp.xmlEV_TEXT_COMPONENT_IMP} -- Implementation
f_clipboard../implementation_gtk/ev_clipboard_imp.xml#f_clipboardclipboard: FalsePOINTER -- Pointer to the CLIPBOARD Gtk clipboard
feature {NONE} -- Implementation
f_primary../implementation_gtk/ev_clipboard_imp.xml#f_primaryprimary: FalsePOINTER -- Pointer to the PRIMARY Gtk clipboard
feature {../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I}
f_destroy../implementation_gtk/ev_clipboard_imp.xml#f_destroydestroy -- Destroy Current do ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_set_is_destroyedset_is_destroyed (True) end
feature {../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY, ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I} -- Implementation
f_interface../implementation_gtk/ev_clipboard_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface: detachable ../interface/ev_clipboard.xmlEV_CLIPBOARD note option: stable attribute end

end -- class ../implementation_gtk/ev_clipboard_imp.xmlEV_CLIPBOARD_IMP
